Text: Hey, tks for the torrent. But let me tell u something useful. There's no reason to pack a FLAC file. It has been already packed at the time you converted wav file (or cd) into flac. Instead, if u let the flac file individual it is more like a cd and more useful because u don't have to deal with the whole package. Anyway i'm greatful for your upload.
#Almammm: Thanks for your comment. In the future I will upload files without compression, you're right.
